message:
I believe you're referring to "StartNew is dangerous": [http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/08/startnew-is-dangerous.html](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/08/startnew-is-dangerous.html) - which says you should use Task.Run instead.

These posts aren't contradictory; they're both saying the same thing: StartNew is a low-level, dangerous method precisely because its default options are *not* what you should use for asynchronous code. Task.Run uses the correct options.
